At that time, the Buddha told the assembly of Bodhisattva Mahasattvas such as Vajra Treasury:
You and your retinue have now offered various mantras, subtle, profound, rare, and secret Dharma treasures, and will obtain such beneficial matters.
I have also studied this Dharma since the past and have all attained accomplishment.

You should also uphold pure conduct, never regress, attain the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, take refuge in the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha, always travel through the six realms to provide protection and care, and encourage the development of bodhicitta, without complaining of hardship.
